tr_quotes.quote: Fikirler hayatı değiştirebilir. Bazen kapıyı açmak için yapmanız gereken tek şey, güzel bir yeni fikirdir.
tr_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyayı değiştiremiyorsan, dünyanı değiştirirsin. Hepsi bu.
tr_quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

tr_quotes.quote: Başlayan her şey biter.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: En uzun yolculuklara bile ufak bir adımla başlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Laotse

tr_quotes.quote: Ya başlamamalı ya da bitirmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Başlangıcı parlak olanın sonu da parlaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Hikem-i Ataiyeden

tr_quotes.quote: Doğruluk sonsuzluğun güneşidir. Nasıl olsa doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Birçok şeye birden başlayan kimse pek azını bitirir.
tr_quotes.author: İngiliz Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyin en mühim noktası başlangıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer en yükseğe ulaşmak istiyorsan en aşağıdan başlamalısın.
tr_quotes.author: P. Syrus

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bitirmek iyi başlamaktan daha üstündür.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün büyük işler küçük başlangıçlarla olur.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Sonuçları değil, başlangıçları değiştirmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Alain

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir başlangıç işin yarısının bitmesi demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristo

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta bazı şeyler gittiğiniz yönün tam zıttına bilinçli bir sıçrayış yapmakla kazanılır.
tr_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık daha akıllıca bir başlangıç yapmak için mükemmel bir fırsattır.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Sorulması gereken soru ben neyi başarabilirim değil ben neyi başarmak istiyorum olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Brene Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Bir işe girişmek için iyi bir gerekçemiz yoksa ona başlamak için iyi bir neden var demektir.
tr_quotes.author: W. Scott

tr_quotes.quote: Birine hoşça kal diyebilecek kadar cesaretinizi toplarsanız hayat size yeni bir merhaba ile selam verir.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Kimse geçmişe gidip yeni bir başlangıç yapamaz ama bugün başlayıp yeni bir son yazabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Bard

tr_quotes.quote: Hakikate giden yolda yapılabilecek iki yanlış vardır: Birincisi yolun sonuna kadar gitmemek ikincisi hiç başlamamak.
tr_quotes.author: Buda

tr_quotes.quote: İşlerinizi yapmaya gerekli olanla başlayın imkânlı olanla devam edin. Bir de bakmışsınız ki imkânsızı başarmışsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Saint Francis of Assisi

tr_quotes.quote: Başlamak için şartların mükemmel olmasını beklemeyin. Şartları mükemmelleştiren başlangıcın kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Alan Cohen

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir başlangıç, yarı yarıya başarı demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük şeyler dürtüler tarafından değil, küçük şeylerin bir araya gelmesi ile yapılır.
tr_quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

tr_quotes.quote: İlerlemenin sırrı, başlamaktan geçer. Başlamanın sırrı ise; tek bir seferde yapılması zor olan karmaşık işleri, üstesinden gelinebilir daha küçük işlere bölmekten.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk vardığınız bir durak değil, bir seyahat biçimidir.
tr_quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

tr_quotes.quote: Yarın bambaşka bir insan olacağım diyorsun. Niçin bugünden başlamıyorsun?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir işe girişmek için iyi bir gerekçemiz yoksa,ona başlamamak için iyi bir nedenimiz var demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeye yeniden başlamak için bazen gitmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başlangıç bütünün yarısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Pisagor

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeye yeniden başlamak için bazen gitmek gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her yeni gün yeniden başlamak için bir fırsattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Herkesin bir sona ihtiyacı vardır. Yeniden başlamak için.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her bitiş, sana yeniden başlamak için iyi bir bahanedir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Allah, yeniden başlayanların yardımcısıdır. Asla vazgeçme!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seni bir yaşam boyu bitirmek değil de, sana hep yeniden başlamak isterim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her yeni başlangıç, yeni bir umudu da beraberinde getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Canan Tan

tr_quotes.quote: Yarın her şey yeniden başlayacak. Sadece bunun için yaşamaya değer.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ah yeniden başlamak hayata; çocukluğa, aşka ve sanata.
tr_quotes.author: Cahit Sıtkı Tarancı

tr_quotes.quote: Daha son sözü söylemedi hayat; belki yarınlar, mutlu sonlar var?
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Yeniden düşünmeye başlamak, yeniden yaşamaya başlamanın mutlak şartıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ali Suad

tr_quotes.quote: Şimdi vakit, yeniden başlamak gibidir hayata. Neresinden başlarsan, orasından kâr.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Boş verdim her şeyi, sildim geçmişi. Temiz bir sayfa açtım geleceğe. Hayata yeniden başlıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün yeniden başlamak için yeni bir fırsattır. Her gün doğum gününüzdür.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Üstada sormuşlar; her şeyi kaybettik ne yapalım diye? Çay koy, yeniden başlıyoruz, demiş.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ayağa kalk ve kendini toparla. Emin ol her zaman yeniden başlamak için bir fırsatın vardır. Vazgeçme!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeniden başlamak lazım bazen hayata, gidenin yerine yenisini koyarak, gelecek olana güven duyarak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sil baştan başlamak gerek bazen. Hayatı sıfırlamak. Sil baştan sevmek gerek bazen. Her şeyi unutmak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni bir sayfa açmak, bütün hisleri arkada bırakıp gitmek, kırık düşleri ezip geçmek için büyük bir başlangıç olacak.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning’s end.
en_quotes.author: Seneca

en_quotes.quote: No one can ever take your memories from you – each day is a new beginning, make good memories every day.
en_quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

en_quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
en_quotes.author: Carl Bard

en_quotes.quote: It’s never too late to become who you want to be. I hope you live a life that you’re proud of, and if you find that you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start over.
en_quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth… not going all the way, and not starting.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: No, this is not the beginning of a new chapter in my life; this is the beginning of a new book! That first book is already closed, ended, and tossed into the seas; this new book is newly opened, has just begun! Look, it is the first page! And it is a beautiful one!
en_quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

en_quotes.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: No river can return to its source, yet all rivers must have a beginning.
en_quotes.author: American Indian Proverb

en_quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
en_quotes.author: Guy Finley

en_quotes.quote: I discovered that a fresh start is a process. A fresh start is a journey – a journey that requires a plan.
en_quotes.author: Vivian Jokotade

en_quotes.quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
en_quotes.author: Herman Hesse

en_quotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Nourish beginnings, let us nourish beginnings. Not all things are blest, but the seeds of all things are blest. The blessing is in the seed.
en_quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

en_quotes.quote: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: You can learn new things at any time in your life if you’re willing to be a beginner. If you actually learn to like being a beginner, the whole world opens up to you.
en_quotes.author: Barbara Shur

en_quotes.quote: There will come a time when you believe everything is finished; that will be the beginning.
en_quotes.author: Louis L’Amour

en_quotes.quote: Change can be scary, but you know what’s scarier? Allowing fear to stop you from growing, evolving, and progressing.
en_quotes.author: Mandy Hale

en_quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance. It gets better by change.
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Each day is a new beginning, the chance to do with it what should be done and not to be seen as simply another day to put in time.
en_quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

en_quotes.quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
en_quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: I realize there’s something incredibly honest about trees in winter, how they’re experts at letting things go.
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey McDaniel

en_quotes.quote: The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life.
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over again, and you will grow stronger until you have accomplished a purpose – not the one you began with perhaps, but one you’ll be glad to remember.
en_quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

en_quotes.quote: Success is not final. Failure is not fatal. It’s the courage to continue that counts.
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
en_quotes.author: Dale Turner

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is predestined. The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Blum

en_quotes.quote: Let’s forget the baggages of the past and make a new beginning.
en_quotes.author: Shahbaz Sharif

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a chance to begin again. Don’t focus on the failures of yesterday, start today with positive thoughts and expectations.
en_quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

en_quotes.quote: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you’ll get to where God wants you to be.
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: No matter how hard the past is, you can always begin again.
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: Celebrate endings – for they precede new beginnings.
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

en_quotes.quote: Begin today. Declare out loud to the universe that you are willing to let go of struggle and eager to learn through joy
en_quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

en_quotes.quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
en_quotes.author: Robin Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a new beginning. Treat it that way. Stay away from what might have been, and look at what can be.
en_quotes.author: Marsha Petrie Sue

en_quotes.quote: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide you’re not going to stay where you are.
en_quotes.author: J.P. Morgan

en_quotes.quote: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
en_quotes.author: Alan Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Let us make each day our birthday – every morning life is new, with the splendors of the sunrise, and the baptism of the dew.
en_quotes.author: S.A.R

en_quotes.quote: Holding on is believing that there’s only a past; letting go is knowing that there’s a future.
en_quotes.author: Daphne Rose Kingma

en_quotes.quote: One can begin so many things with a new person – even begin to be a better man.
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go. They merely determine where you start.
en_quotes.author: Nido Qubein

en_quotes.quote: Starting over is an acceptance of a past we can’t change, an unrelenting conviction that the future can be different, and the stubborn wisdom to use the past to make the future what the past was not.
en_quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

en_quotes.quote: Life is about change, sometimes it’s painful, sometimes it’s beautiful, but most of the time it’s both.
en_quotes.author: Kristin Kreuk

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a fresh beginning, Every morn is the world made new.
en_quotes.author: Sarah Chauncey Woolsey

en_quotes.quote: The thrill of new beginnings is immensely alluring!
en_quotes.author: Avijeet Das

en_quotes.quote: You start whenever you decide to start.
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: A new dawn always breaks after darkness, but only those who have survived the night live to see it.
en_quotes.author: Tristan Roulot

en_quotes.quote: Where life comes to an end, more should begin.
en_quotes.author: A.D. Aliwat

en_quotes.quote: If something great is going to happen in your tomorrow there are certain thing’s that need to end today.
en_quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

en_quotes.quote: There is always a new beginning…Doors are unlimited, always open, if one closes and that moment the other opens.
en_quotes.author: Vandana Agarwal

en_quotes.quote: A new beginning is a blank canvas ready and thirsty for paint. For many though, fear and worry come along with it.
en_quotes.author: Chaker Khazaal

en_quotes.quote: Forget everything you’ve done. Start over.
en_quotes.author: Marty Rubin

en_quotes.quote: A new canvas can always make me feel good inside.
en_quotes.author: Billy-Dean Gonzalez

en_quotes.quote: Convince yourself everyday that you are worthy of a good life. Let go of stress, breathe. Stay positive, all is well.
en_quotes.author: Germany Kent

en_quotes.quote: Destinations are endpoints. Journeys are learnings, paths of possibilities, blossoming… fresh beginnings.
en_quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

en_quotes.quote: Sunrise and sunset are beautiful moments but you can’t hold them. Let things move. There will be more sunrises and sunsets.
en_quotes.author: Shunya

en_quotes.quote: It is not the failure that holds us back but the reluctance to begin over again that causes us to stagnate.
en_quotes.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

en_quotes.quote: The darkest hours bring the most light.
en_quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

en_quotes.quote: New beginnings always start in the here-and-now.
en_quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

en_quotes.quote: From the end spring new beginnings.
en_quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

en_quotes.quote: And there’s always a way to begin with.
en_quotes.author: Autumn Doughton

en_quotes.quote: We have plenty of tomorrows to compensate for the wrongs made yesterday.
en_quotes.author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

en_quotes.quote: Sooner or later we’ve all got to let go of our past.
en_quotes.author: Dan Brown

en_quotes.quote: What is not started today is never finished tomorrow.
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all, in which case you have failed by default.
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: Everybody falls sometimes, when that happens you need to find the strength to rise from the ashes.
The scariest moment is always just before you start.
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: Starting today, I need to forget what’s gone. Appreciate what still remains and look forward to what’s coming next.
You don’t have to be great to start, but you do have to start to be great.
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.
en_quotes.author: Philip Pullman

en_quotes.quote: Have enough courage to start and enough heart to finish.
en_quotes.author: Jessica S. Yourko

en_quotes.quote: You will evolve past certain people. Let yourself.
en_quotes.author: Mandy Hale

en_quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: There comes a day when you realize turning the page is the best feeling in the world, because you realize there is so much more to the book than the page you were stuck on.
en_quotes.author: Zayn Malik

en_quotes.quote: Never feel guilty for starting again.
en_quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

en_quotes.quote: Making a big life change can be scary but living with regret is always scarier.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: The sun is a daily reminder that we too can rise again from the darkness, that we too can shine our own light.
en_quotes.author: S. Ajna

en_quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Failure lies not in falling down. Failure lies in not getting up.
en_quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

en_quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: To let go is to release the images and emotions, the grudges and fears, the clingings and disappointments of the past that bind our spirit.
en_quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

en_quotes.quote: Why let go of yesterday? Because yesterday has already let go of you.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes painful endings bring the best new beginnings.
en_quotes.author: Shae Ross

en_quotes.quote: Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.
en_quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

en_quotes.quote: Start by doing what’s necessary; then do what’s possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
en_quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

en_quotes.quote: Starting over can be challenging, but also it can be a great opportunity to do things differently.
en_quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

en_quotes.quote: If all you can do is crawl, start crawling.
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: The life you have led doesn’t need to be the only life you have.
en_quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

en_quotes.quote: A time comes when you need to stop waiting for the man you want to become and start being the man you want to be.
en_quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

en_quotes.quote: Set fire to the broken pieces; start anew.
en_quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

en_quotes.quote: But here’s the thing: The something new, it isn’t necessarily bad. In fact, in some ways, maybe it’s better.
en_quotes.author: Nick Lake

en_quotes.quote: The present changes the past. Looking back you do not find what you left behind
en_quotes.author: Kiran Desai

en_quotes.quote: A fresh approach is needed — an analysis of our human situation from a basis that recognises and confronts the psychological dimension to our behaviour.
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Griffith

en_quotes.quote: When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about.’
en_quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

en_quotes.quote: That morning he feels fresh-scrubbed and cleansed, as if he is being given yet another opportunity to live his life correctly.’
en_quotes.author: Hanya Yanagihara

en_quotes.quote: Hit the reset button. Whatever happened yesterday, forget about it. Get a new perspective. Today is a new day. Fresh start, begins now.
en_quotes.author: Germany Kent

en_quotes.quote: It’s in those quiet little towns, at the edge of the world, that you will find the salt of the earth people who make you feel right at home.
en_quotes.author: Aaron Lauritsen

en_quotes.quote: The hardest part is starting. Once you get that out of the way, you’ll find the rest of the journey much easier.
en_quotes.author: Simon Sinek

en_quotes.quote: The splendid thing about falling apart silently…is that you can start over as many times as you like.
en_quotes.author: Sanober Khan

en_quotes.quote: If you want to fly in the sky, you need to leave the earth. If you want to move forward, you need to let go the past that drags you down.
en_quotes.author: Amit Ray

en_quotes.quote: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
en_quotes.author: Alyson Noel

en_quotes.quote: Everything begins at the beginning, and quite often the beginning begins when you shift your mind in a new direction.
en_quotes.author: Louie Herron

en_quotes.quote: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: If you’re brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coehlo

en_quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid of new beginnings. Don’t shy away from new people, new energy, new surroundings. Embrace new chances at happiness.
Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
en_quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

en_quotes.quote: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: The life you have led doesn’t need to be the only life you have.
en_quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

en_quotes.quote: The only way around is through.
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go. They merely determine where you start.
en_quotes.author: Nido Qubein

en_quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
en_quotes.author: Germany Kent

en_quotes.quote: You may have a fresh start any moment you choose, for this thing that we call ‘failure’ is not the falling down, but the staying down.
en_quotes.author: Mary Pickford

en_quotes.quote: When it’s time to die, go ahead and die, and when it’s time to live, live. Don’t sort-of-maybe live, but live like you’re going all out, like you’re not afraid.
en_quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

en_quotes.quote: There are no happy endings. Endings are the saddest part, so just give me a happy middle and a very happy start.
en_quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

en_quotes.quote: Every moment is a new beginning.
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel
